description: The Benton County mental‑health court participant handbook requires participants in the two‑week orientation to attend three orientation sessions and **one peer support meeting per week**, along with community support meetings.  This demonstrates that peer support meetings are a built‑in requirement of mental‑health specialty court programming.
source: Benton County Mental Health Court Outpatient Handbook (2025)
quote: Attend 3 orientation sessions and 1 Peer Support meeting per week ... Attend Community support meetings no less than two times per week 【896764406014482†L380-L390】
